title: Can Cancel Culture Actually Kill You?
description:
Cancel culture has created alternative facts for health, so Jillian sets us straight on that and on yet another new, gimmicky diet. Plus, a call about working out with diastasis recti. (recorded 2/12/20 when Jillian had a cold, but she’s fine now!)

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
